item.title: [p30a] Path of Ancestry
item.description:
Land

Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [p30a] Dramatic Reversal
item.description:
Instant

Untap all nonland permanents you control.

item.title: [p30a] Beast Whisperer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

item.title: [p30a] Dovin's Veto
item.description:
Instant

This spell can't be countered.

Counter target noncreature spell.

item.title: [p30a] Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Cleric

Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

{3}{B}{B}: Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [p30a] Deadly Dispute
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.

Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [bro] Mishra, Claimed by Gix
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Human Artificer

Whenever you attack, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of attacking creatures. If Mishra, Claimed by Gix and a creature named Phyrexian Dragon Engine are attacking, and you both own and control them, exile them, then meld them into Mishra, Lost to Phyrexia. It enters the battlefield tapped and attacking.

item.title: [bro] Phyrexian Dragon Engine
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Dragon

Double strike

When Phyrexian Dragon Engine enters the battlefield from your graveyard, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw three cards.

Unearth {3}{R}{R}

(Melds with Mishra, Claimed by Gix.)

item.title: [bro] Mishra, Lost to Phyrexia
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Artificer

Whenever Mishra, Lost to Phyrexia enters the battlefield or attacks, choose three —

• Target opponent discards two cards.

• Mishra deals 3 damage to any target.

• Destroy target artifact or planeswalker.

• Creatures you control gain menace and trample until end of turn.

• Creatures you don't control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

• Create two tapped Powerstone tokens.

item.title: [pr23] Mystical Dispute
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a blue spell.

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

item.title: [pr23] Thing in the Ice // Awoken Horror
item.description: Creature — Horror // Creature — Kraken Horror

item.title: [pr23] Snapcaster Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Flash

When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [dmr] Counterspell
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell.

item.title: [dmr] Birds of Paradise
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [dmr] Birds of Paradise
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [dmr] Jester's Cap
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

item.title: [dmr] Time Stretch
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player takes two extra turns after this one.

item.title: [brr] Howling Mine
item.description:
Artifact

At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

item.title: [brr] Howling Mine
item.description:
Artifact

At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

item.title: [brr] Phyrexian Revoker
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Horror

As Phyrexian Revoker enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.

Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

item.description:

item.title: [sld] Sarkhan Vol
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Sarkhan

+1: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

−2: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

−6: Create five 4/4 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.

item.title: [sld] Narset, Parter of Veils
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Narset

Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn.

−2: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [sld] Elspeth, Sun's Champion
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Elspeth

+1: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

−3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater.

−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

item.title: [sld] Garruk Wildspeaker
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Garruk

+1: Untap two target lands.

−1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

−4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Saheeli, Sublime Artificer
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Saheeli

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

−2: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

item.title: [inv] Urborg Skeleton
item.description:
Creature — Skeleton

Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)

{B}: Regenerate Urborg Skeleton.

If Urborg Skeleton was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [inv] Soul Burn
item.description:
Sorcery

Spend only black and/or red mana on X.

Soul Burn deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.
